remarks: The inversion operation in the extended real numbers.  The extended real is not a group, as its addition is not associative.  (cf. ~ xaddass and ~ df-xrs ), however it has an inversion operation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Jun-2017.)
statement: xrsinvgval $p |- ( B e. RR* -> ( ( invg ` RR*s ) ` B ) = -e B ) $.
